goal.en: "On successful completion of this course, students will be able to1. Perfect reading on official Spanish as Castellano, well understanding on pronunciation, stress and intonation2. 50 conjugations, including regular and irregular3. Well understanding on basic sentences, uses basic Spanish nouns, adjectives and verbs on conversation practices.4. Practicing greetings, weather themes on conversation via groups’ interactions5. Bringing stories of Spanish culture, music and contemporary society to stimulate students’ interestGuiding students to close local Spanish themes for multi-cultures learning and approach to global market"
goal.ch: "1、正確朗讀正統西班牙文，完全掌握發音、重音、語調2、學習動詞變化50個，包括規則動詞及不規則動詞3、認識基本句型，將入門西文名詞、形容詞及動詞，套用在各式句型，學生可以靈活應用西文在會話造句上4、使用問候、天氣等會話句型，平常上課小組實地練習，增加學生的西班牙實務對話經驗5、導引學生接觸台灣在地的西班牙風情、西班牙企業，在英語之外，接受多語文的認知與學習，向全球化職場邁出第一步。"

content.en:
"This semester is first part of full annual program. The course is designed on teaching material with bilinguals in Spanish & English and Oral teaching in Chinese. Some Chinese material is provided at class too. At the first semester, students will learn from pronunciation into subjects-learning as following:Pronunciation and spelling. (El alfabeto y la pronunciaci?n): Vowel and Consonants, Syllabification, Accentuation, Punctuation and Capitalization.
The 1st Chapter: Getting Around Town-Where is it? the grammar topics: the use of HAY and SER/Articles and Gender of Nouns/ Question Formation/Negative Sentence/Plural Nouns/Compound Nouns/ Noun Phrases)The 2nd Chapter: Describing Places and Thingsthe grammar topics: Agreement of Adjectives/ position of Adjectives/Short Forms of Adjectives/ Ser to be/ Contraction DEL/ possessive Adjectives/ Question Formation/ the use of emphasize/Noun phrase functions.The 3rd Chapter: Nationalities, Professions, Food, and Films.the grammar topics: Subject pronouns/ SER to be/ Adjectives of Nationality/ ?QU?! in exclamations- information Questions/YES or No questions/ Negative sentence/ position of Adjectives/prepositions/demonstrative adjectives/ gender of Nouns that referThe 4th Chapter: Describing People, Emotions, and Health. the grammar topics: the use of ESTAR and SER/ adverbs of places with prepositions/Tag questions/ ESTAR+past participle:Expressing positions of the body/SER and ESTAR in Yes or No questions."
content.ch: 本課程設計為全學年西班牙文的上學期之3學分，採取英、西文雙語教材、上學期以中文授課，搭配教師課堂間提供之中文教材。上學期由發音理論入門同時與課程用書主題性章節內搭配學習。
